div.p: Greetings. I excused the business matters that have prevented me from writing; I also hope to set out to you shortly and that we can discuss many matters. I do not know what Mr. St. Laurentius wrote to you about those letters which you wrote to me, which I have always interpreted in the best way. You will write to me through this person, whom I am sending to the Rhaetians.
My wife sends her greetings to you.
You will greet our mutual friends.
